main event: On 13 August 1952, approximately 20 airmen and two civilians at MacDill Air Force Base in Florida observed one to three flying objects gaining altitude and changing course abruptly.
interesting points: The objects were observed moving in excess of 600 mph,One object hovered for about five minutes before resuming its course,The sighting lasted for about twenty minutes,The objects appeared to be oval-shaped and silver-colored,Other sightings include radar detection of unidentified targets for about 45 minutes.
